languages.text: These gloves allow the wearer to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} using {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: These gloves allow the wearer to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} melee attacks with their ranged weapon using {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}.

These gloves allow the wearer to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} using {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，招架几率取决于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}，而非{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}。

languages.text: Позволяют {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия, используя значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}.

languages.text: Estos guantes permiten al portador {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con su arma {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}a distancia{/g}, usando {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en lugar de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Estos guantes permiten al portador {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con su arma {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, usando {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en lugar de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.
